name: nandina
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves) that produces bright red berries (= small fruit): The branches of the nandina were loaded with red berries. She added a spray of nandina to the decoration.
More examplesFewer examplesNandina would be an ideal shrub to plant if you want to give your garden some colour in the autumn.Nandina is often planted outside temples in India.They enjoy hot summers that allow them to grow plants such as edgeworthias and nandinas.
